title: 08/20/2021 - HOUR 1 - Patriots-Eagles, Cowboys, LeBron
itunes:title: 08/20/2021 - HOUR 1 - Patriots-Eagles, Cowboys, LeBron
description:
The Eagles look horrible and the Patriots will have some easy wins this season

Dak Prescott's injury is a big problem for the Cowboys

LeBron James should get more consideration for best player in the league


Guest: Kevin Clark

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
